title: Sam and Max is coming back to the gaming world!
content:
[url=http://www.adventuregamers.com/newsitem.php?id=1061]www.adventuregamers.com/n...hp?id=1061[/url]

Words can not express what I'm feeling right now. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Check out my blog at [url=http://spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/]spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/[/url]
Check out my fanfics at [url=http://www.fanfiction.net/u/680124/]fanfiction.net[/url]

title: Re: Sam and Max is coming back to the gaming world!
content:
This is... what, the third time a sequels is announced?
For the fans let's hope it won't be the third time it's subsequently cancelled as well.

I may be a fan myself as well, or may become one rather, but I didn't play the original, yet.
Not sure if the game's really my style though, I'm not familiar with the original comics either, but I'll know then. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]
